entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, a student at Hogwarts. He is described as feeling elated and lucky.

entities.name: dean
entities.description: A person who made an angry retort, but no further details are provided.

entities.name: slughorn
entities.description: A professor at Hogwarts, mentioned as being involved in the memory Harry is trying to retrieve.

entities.name: filch
entities.description: The caretaker of Hogwarts, who forgot to lock the front door.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: A gamekeeper at Hogwarts, whose house Harry is visiting.

relationships.description: Dean made an angry retort that Harry heard.
Harry is trying to retrieve a memory from Slughorn.
Filch forgot to lock the front door, which Harry found open.
